title: Smart Data Models - Bike Lane Schema

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be BikeLanes

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Unique cycle route code.

laneOccupancy.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the number of vehicles circulating on the lane.

laneLength.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'meter'. Indicates the length of the lane.

laneWidth.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the width of the lane.

typology.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of cycle path (delimitation, location, function).

infrastructureType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of location/infrastructure hosting the lane.

regulation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Regulation applied to the corresponding Bike path.

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat.
